description: bridge with arches, ULQ; man with horse at center; seated figure, LLC; other figures with horses at water's edge and in water
medium: Pen and ink, graphite, blue ink and white heightening
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1995; sold in July for SLT with etching of same title, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1995-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
title: L'Abreuvoir au Pont Marie
